name: MarketGenie
0:
”Alexa open market genie”
”Alexa, ask market genie what's the price of AAPL”
”Alexa, ask market genie to report my watchlist”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: market genie
des:
Market Genie allows you to check real-time stock prices and lets you add or remove stocks to a personal watchlist. Market genie allows you to check the stocks in your watchlist and will also give you a report on the full watchlist. 

Say "Alexa, ask Market Genie what's the price of {ticker}". Market Genie responds to a ticker name instead of company name.

Say "Alexa, ask Market Genie how is my watchlist doing." Market Genie will respond with the companies added and their stock price. 

Disclaimer: Market Genie is not guaranteed the accuracy of stock information and is only for informational purposes only. Do not use Market Genie for investment decision, they shall not be liable to any person for delays or inaccuracies in stock data.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
